high_descs: Turn to your left at the dresses with the pen on top of it.
Pick up the pen from the dresser.
Walk to your left towards the lamp with a green shade on the dresser.
Turn the lamp with the green shade on.
anns.task_desc: Pick up the pen from the dresser and turn the lamp on.

high_descs: turn left, face desk with lamp
pick up white pen from desk
go to the lamp on left end of desk
anns.task_desc: pick up pen, turn on lamp

high_descs: Walk forward to end of table, turn left
Pick up pen off of table
Turn left, walk back to end of table
Turn on light on top of table
anns.task_desc: Pick up pen from end of table, return to other end of table to turn on light
